overview: City of Dark is about meetings, attractions, deception, loss and a trip across town. A journey where men meet with their secret desires and part with longing. Where days have love and intimacy for the two men but the night threatens a different ending for women who wander in the city.  Set over two car journeys in a void, the story unfolds in a city hopeful in the day and unkind after dark.
title: City of Dark
